english.segment1: Walking on the seaside. With a sunset over blue. Hand in hand with you
english.segment2: Listen to the waves break. On a blanket spread for two. Hand in hand with you
english.segment3: If I had a million sand dollars. IÂ’d spend them all on you. And build a sandcastle. Just big enough for two
english.segment4: So look me in the eyes, dear. And know my love is true. Hand in hand with you
